projects.name: Spotify Recent Favorites
projects.description: An application that displays your most listened tracks and artists on Spotify.

projects.name: Laser Refraction & Reflection
projects.description: Scientific laser refraction 'sandbox' supporting custom values.

projects.name: Typechase
projects.description: Obvious typeracer copy, so an application for testing and practising typing speed. Does support custom texts but also has a lot of pre-gathered ones.

projects.name: Peigom-Bot
projects.description: Hardwired node.js discord bot for VOIP service Discord. Features many custom commands and some server management tools.

projects.name: Thonk Paint
projects.description: Novelty web paint with the thinking emoji as the brush. Express your thoughts and have a go! I was surprised by how interesting 'art' you can actually paint with this.
